name: PONGGERS (Didilusse)
description:
I made this game while I was in 3D Gamedev club. I made the basic mechanics in an hour and polished the game for less then 2. This small project was fun to work on because I didn't code in a while and it was a nice refresher. This is basically a dumber version of Pong where you have to get the highest score possible. 

Pong + pogger = Pongger

I am going to add a couple QoL updates and maybe new feature or mode. If you have any suggestions please join my discord server: https://discord.gg/YjRRj95uKQ.
